[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [navigateBlock](./blockly.navigateblock_1_function.md)

## navigateBlock() function

Returns the next navigable item relative to the provided block child.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function navigateBlock(current: Icon | Field | RenderedConnection | BlockSvg, delta: number): IFocusableNode | null;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

current


</td><td>

[Icon](./blockly.icons_namespace.icon_class.md) \| [Field](./blockly.field_class.md) \| RenderedConnection \| [BlockSvg](./blockly.blocksvg_class.md)


</td><td>

The navigable block child item to navigate relative to.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

delta


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The difference in index to navigate; positive values navigate forward by n, while negative values navigate backwards by n.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[IFocusableNode](./blockly.ifocusablenode_interface.md) \| null

The navigable block child offset by `delta` relative to `current`<!-- -->.
